originalText.text: I have been here two times, and both times, after I purchase my food at ONE price that they show me on the screen, I see a TOTALLY different price on my account. They are stealing from you!!! BE CAREFUL AND ALWAYS GET YOUR RECEIPT!!! IF NOT THEY WILL TAKE MONEY FROM YOU WITHOUT YOUR CONSENT!!! DO NOT TRUST THIS PLACE!!!

originalText.text: If anyone sees this comment please share your expertise. Iâ€™ve lived in NYC all my life but Iâ€™m trying to understand how stores/bodegas run business especially when it comes to pricing items. For example, a store like Target, charges you the exact price of items plus tax and all of that. If you buy 3 items, again this is an example, and those items are $3.25, $1.50 and $7.00 then the total price will be $11.75. Right?. Why does it feel like certain stores/bodegas round the prices for items that you purchase? Like it feels like you are not paying the exact amount of what you are buying? Why canâ€™t all stores/bodegas scan the items of purchase to at least feel like what you are paying for is right as a customer.

originalText.text: Food was OK ham was nice the rest of it ie. Bread, Salad, Sauce all tasted bland and the same no tatse difference at all. Staff were slightly dismissive but on the rude side, nothing unattractive though. If anything it adds to that classic NY Deli/Bodega image we all have ðŸ˜†. The area of which it is situated isn't the best I wouldn't reccomend a night visit unless you were based local during the day it was bad enough however that stands more for the nearby Fulton Street subway entrance. If I had to summarise, Food was OK, Area wasn't the best, Convinece was good, Selection was poor but I'd go again if I was nearby. Only thing I'd say is when I went they only had cold options don't know if that's a permanent thing just be mindful.

originalText.text: My experience with the chicken salad I bought was beyond terrible. I can't believe the audacity of the establishment to serve me a portion that was not only shockingly minuscule but also consisted of chicken pieces that were practically microscopic. It was as if they were mocking me with their pathetic attempt at a meal. I felt like I was robbed of my money and my appetite. I wouldn't wish this disappointment on my worst enemy. Avoid this place at all costs!
